<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Fire Mephit](/Monsters.aspx?ID=194)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Fire mephits are conniving and quick to anger. They aren’t evil, but they delight in inflicting pain, and their love of burning things pushes them the closest to this alignment of all mephits. They have bright-orange skin, and wisps of flame flicker along their wings as they flap through the air. The rivalry between fire and water mephits is notorious, and these creatures loathe working together for any amount of time.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Fire Mephit](/Monsters.aspx?ID=194)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Elemental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=57" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 151</row>

**Perception** +3; darkvision, smoke vision

**Languages**
[Ignan](/Languages.aspx?ID=18)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +4

**Con** +0

**Int** -2

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Smoke Vision** The fire mephit ignores the concealed condition from smoke.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +3 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +7 

</row>

**HP** 16
([fast healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=15) 2 (while touching fire))

**Immunities**
bleed, fire, paralyzed, poison, sleep

**Weaknesses**
cold 3

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, fly 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +9 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6 piercing and 1d4 fire

**Arcane Innate Spells** DC 15
- **Cantrips (1st)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171)

**Breath Weapon** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)) The fire mephit breathes flames in a 15-foot cone that deals 2d4 fire and 1d4 persistent fire damage to each creature within the area (DC 17 basic Reflex save). The fire mephit can’t use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds.

</column>
